category: Herbs that Clear Heat and Purge Fire

action.primary: Dispels Heat, relieves toxicity, diminishes inflammation
Promotes diuresis, resolves stones and smooths urination

indications: Difficult urination, urolithiasis, gonorrhea, dysuria renal and vessicle calculi

notes: This herb can be pounded into a powder for ear drops with sesame oil or puffed through nose.
